name: Jam quest (bltnico)
description:
Proposal for the  itch.io markjam-3  ! https://itch.io/jam/markjam-3

Jam Quest is an action aventure game mixing platformer and boss fighting based on Wario Ware like mini-games, with a retro RPG feeling !

The Jar of Harmony containing the sacred jam has been broken, beat all the mighty fruits guardian mini-games, collect the sacred fruits, fight against the final boss :  the frightening DARTH APPLE and restore peace in the country of Jamerica !

All the assets are original creations, including the music and the game sounds !

If you want free music for games, check https://soundcloud.com/powered-rails and get in touch ;)

Hope you'll enjoy this fruitty and juicy quest 🍍 !
